pullrequest.title: Build plugin libraries as MODULE instead of SHARED

content.raw: If it helps, I can also backport the search for `.so` extensions on OS X to gazebo7, without deprecating or changing how the plugins are compiled. This wouldn't make it into the official ubuntu releases, but it would be in the debs on packages.osrfoundation.org
content.html: If it helps, I can also backport the search for .so extensions on OS X to gazebo7, without deprecating or changing how the plugins are compiled. This wouldn't make it into the official ubuntu releases, but it would be in the debs on packages.osrfoundation.org
